name: DIY MY BOY
description:
This is a diy-based leisure and entertainment game. Players can customize the appearance of the boy’s dress, hairstyle, eyes, etc., or upload photos or pictures by themselves to generate a head model, and then choose their favorite body generation New boy. You can also take your boy to the various scenes together, and you can also let your boy do the specified actions, you can also tease your boy, click on the highlight on the boy and the boy will do it according to the click position. Different actions. Among them, the live wallpaper mode allows your boy to be displayed on the desktop, so that the player can change the boy while doing other things, enjoy the boy dancing, and switch between different boys to enjoy it.

Instructions:
Move: wasd;
Rotation: up, down, left and right;
Interaction: click with the left mouse button;
Zoom: mouse wheel.
